Package reservation

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
reservation.ReservationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileIO.ReadWrite
public class ReservationManager extends Object implements FileIO.ReadWrite
Contains control methods to manage the reservation records. Implements ReadWrite interface to do file input and output.
Since:
2022-04-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
TeresaHung

    • readReservation

      public ArrayList<Reservation> readReservation()
      Reads in the reservation record from file "reservation.txt" and creates the reservation list.
      Returns:
      reservation list.

    • writeReservation

      public void writeReservation()
      Output the records in reservation list to the file "reservation.txt".

    • removeReservRecord

      public void removeReservRecord(String reservCode)
      Removes a reservation record from the file.
      Parameters:
      reservCode - The corresponding code of the reservation to be removed.

    • createReservCode

      public String createReservCode()
      Generates an unique reservation code randomly. The reservation code consists of an uppercase letter and a random number from 1 to 999.
      Returns:
      reservation code.

    • addReserv

      public void addReserv(Reservation reserv)
      Adds a reservation record to the reservation list.
      Parameters:
      reserv - The reservation object to be added.

    • checkDates

      public boolean checkDates(LocalDate dCI, LocalDate dCO)
      Checks whether the scheduled length of stay is valid. Invalid length of stay refers that date of departure from the hotel is earlier than the date of arrival.
      Parameters:
      dCI - The check-in date.
      dCO - The check-out date.
      Returns:
      true if the length of stay is valid; Otherwise, return false.

    • updateCheckInDate

      public void updateCheckInDate(String reservCode, String date)
      Updates the date of check in of a reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservCode - The code of the reservation to be updated.
      date - The new check-in date.

    • updateCheckOutDate

      public void updateCheckOutDate(String reservCode, String date)
      Updates the date of check out of a reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservCode - The code of the reservation to be updated.
      date - The new check-out date.

    • searchReserv

      public Reservation searchReserv(String code)
      Searches a reservation record by the reservation code.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the target reservation.
      Returns:
      the corresponding reservation object or null if the reservation record is not found.

    • updateWaitlist

      public void updateWaitlist(ArrayList<Room> roomlist)
      Updates the reservation in waitlist. If there is any vacant room which meets the requested type, then assign the room to this reservation. Changes the reservation status to CONFIRMED when successfully assigned a room.
      Parameters:
      roomlist - The list of hotel rooms.

    • checkIn

      public boolean checkIn(Reservation reserv)
      Checks in to the hotel. Guests are allowed to check in from 2 p.m. on the scheduled date of check in with a confirmed reservation.
      Parameters:
      reserv - The associated reservation of check-in.
      Returns:
      true if check in successfully; Otherwise, return false.

    • expire

      public void expire(Reservation reserv)
      Sets the status of the reservation to EXPIRED and free the room. The reservation will be expired if no one checks in by 2 a.m. on the next day of scheduled date of check in.
      Parameters:
      reserv - The reservation that is expired.

    • printAllReserv

      public void printAllReserv()
